text: @KellyannePolls Really. How many teenagers Murder? A #COVID19 carrier can kill adults. Parents Teachers Grandparents. #coronavirus is a domino effect that’s why it’s called a #Pandemic. @CDCDirector @NIH #DrFauci #DrBirx would concur.
